DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , safety , tolerability Brivanib Chinese subject Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma ( HCC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Determine Pharmacokinetics Safety Brivanib Chinese Subjects With Advanced Primary Liver Cancer ( Hepatocellular Carcinoma : HCC )
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com .
